data.title: "OLD" is GOLD
data.statement:
"OLD" is gold
The mode is reverse just watch the test case and the title carefully

Example:
INPUT            OUTPUT

the ninja                       844330664446652

yasser                            99927777 777733777

zyzz                                 9999 999 9999 9999

abaa                                 2 22 2 2

gods are made            46663777702777330623 33

hide n seek                    44 4443 330660777733 3355

petrs                                 7338777 7777

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn: the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs

data.constraints: String S not containing more than 100 chars
data.inputDescription: Line1 : A line containing just small case letter and spaces (S)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

"OLD" is gold
The mode is reverse just watch the test case and the title carefully

Example:
INPUT OUTPUT

the ninja 844330664446652

yasser 99927777 777733777

zyzz 9999 999 9999 9999

abaa 2 22 2 2

gods are made 46663777702777330623 33

hide n seek 44 4443 330660777733 3355

petrs 7338777 7777
Input
Line1 : A line containing just small case letter and spaces (S)
Output
Line2 : Numbers
Constraints
String S not containing more than 100 chars
Example
Input
bob
Output
2266622
